title: When Sylas steals your ult but you're too fed to care

replies.body: It's like if a hobo steals a dollar from a millionaire.

Excuse me sir, a hobo never steals, he earns his living,

as a matter of a fact, Mister, a real hobo won't take no free money from no damn millionaire, but only his earned pay.
What you're saying isn't wrong, but its kinda besides the point
I think the relation of this comment and the joke flew over your head.

{{champion:517}} 0/5/2 Now I've got your...
{{champion:67}} 20/0/10 _\*Oneshots with single basicattack\*_

My turn:

{{champion:517}} 0/2/3 Now I've got your...
{{champion:240}}  11/0/6 _\*E>Q>Wx4> Dead\*_

Honestly, this is exactly how it feels to get smacked down after stealing an Ultimate.
